content.question:
. . . namque avia cursu

dum sequor et nota excedo regione viarum,

heu misero coniunx fatone erepta Creusa

substitit, erravitne via seu lassa resedit,

incertum. . . .

1. Write out and translate two Latin clauses from lines 1-2 (namque . . . viarum) that describe Aeneas' location.

frqParts.text:
. . . namque avia cursu

dum sequor et nota excedo regione viarum,

heu misero coniunx fatone erepta Creusa

substitit, erravitne via seu lassa resedit,

incertum. . . .

1. Write out and translate two Latin clauses from lines 1-2 (namque . . . viarum) that describe Aeneas' location.
2. Write out and translate two Latin words or phrases from lines 3-4 (heu . . . resedit) that provide possible explanations for the disappearance of Creusa.
3. Briefly explain why Creusa's disappearance is essential to the plot of Books 7-12.
